welcome page.This is a reaction course designed for R: This is a reaction course designed for RS School students of the 2021Q3 set who have passed RS School stage #2, as well as for new students who have knowledge and practical experience in using the following technologies and tools:
welcome page.Git, GitHub (clone, add, commit, push, p: Git, GitHub (clone, add, commit, push, pull, merge, rebase, work with Pull Request)
welcome page.During the course the work with class co: During the course the work with class components, react-router v6, hooks, forms, api, custom app state and redux was studied.
welcome page.an application that helps an individual: an application that helps an individual in a team or group of developers achieve their objectives.
welcome page.We have tried to develop a convenient an: We have tried to develop a convenient and multifunctional application that will help you control your tasks. The application is localized in two languages.
